original_title: Wo Kinder spielten - Vermächtnis und Verantwortung, eine Talgeschichte
overview: It is about Andrea Iten, Eugen Häusler and Fridolin Bossard, who have a close connection to the old and new Aegeri Valley and deal with the heritage of their ancestors in different ways. The documentary also literally immerses viewers in the decades-long tradition of children's sanatoriums in Ägeri. The valley was a well-known children's spa for generations.
title: Wo Kinder spielten - Vermächtnis und Verantwortung, eine Talgeschichte
